name: By Train & Bus
items: Bus lines 21 & 22: see the route planner App. Bus lines 21 and 22 are direct lines between Osnabrück's central station and our building (bus stop: Hochschulen Westerberg). At least every 20 minutes, 15-18 minutes travelling time.
